Ensure the efficient and effective decision making of the CM Board by managing the agenda, facilitating decision making, communicating outcomes and enabling reporting cycles.
1. Managing the agenda:
Prepare agenda with CM Board chairman (VPs)
Retrieve meeting input from PLs and Directors
Share agenda with attendees
Ensure presenters are invited and know what to present
2. Facilitating Decision Making
Ensure content is prepared and available in due time 
Prepare CM board with content so they are ready to make decisions
Secure presence of deciders on decision topics
Secure follow up on decisions/actions
3. Communicating Outcomes
Communicate outcome of results
Organize lessons learned
4. Enabling Reporting Cycles
Ensure on time delivery of KPI reporting and dashboards

To improve ASML Configuration Management by leading and managing business improvement projects.
